title: Ticket #4258: glidein collector spends a lot of time walking the table
description:
Watching the CMS glidein collector with 'pstack' and 'top', I observe that it's basically 100% CPU-bound all the time.

The main culprits are ClassAd deserialization for updates (which is a pretty big surgery to improve) and processing invalidations.

It seems that a large number of the invalidations trigger a full table walk, to the point where we are doing it multiple times a second.

Can we delay the processing of these table walks? Maybe batch them once a second?
